name: FTP

metadata.description:
FTP Sensor


This actuator allows you to send a file to and FTP server using SFTP.

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed
Raw Data
  • response (only returns on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • FTP_USR: FTP server username
  • FTP_PWD: FPT server password (we do not recommend to fill in the password as plaintext use declerative binding in combination with vault)
  • FTP_HOST: FTP server fully qualified domain name
  • FTP_PORT: Port FTP server is listening on
  • FTP_FILEPATH: The location on the FTP server where the file will be sent to
  • filename: Name of the file that will be sent to the FTP server (if left empty a filename will be generated)
  • data: The data that will be sent to the FTP server
